Suggest appropriate quota based on needs

Source: R/quota.R
suggest_quota.Rd

Suggest appropriate quota based on needs

Usage

suggest_quota(vcpus_needed)

Arguments

vcpus_needed

vCPUs needed

Value

Suggested quota value
